extendedInfo.description: TextTalker is a text-to-speech application that is particularly well-suited for reading Ebonics phrases with a British accent.  Naturally, this leads to *hours of fun!*Requirements include Android v1.6 and a sense of humor.  Political incorrectness is optional, but highly encouraged.

reviews.comment: Yo Taylor I\'m really happy for you and i\'ma let you fenish, but be on say had the best video of all time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: not bad... its just the default tts reader. I\'m american and already have the British tts set cuz it sounds more normal. but I am very worldly...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says and doesn\'t require mucking with system speech options. The UI has some weirdness and the icon is ugly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can be extremely funny but REALLY needs volume control. More voices would make it better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its prety cool but when ever i tell it to say stuff in uk voice it doesnt please fix

reviews.comment: Uses voice app in your settingzs and put a coupple ebonics phrases in thw text to speech, lame uninstall

reviews.comment: made my study hall alot less boring. \"Mrs. P is a hoebag\" haha good times.

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: This app needs a few guy voice options too though.

reviews.comment: Was really good, but need to be able to change speech rate

reviews.comment: Cool app, but why not have the voice speak other languages? The whole thing with Kanye got blowen out of proportion by the media.

reviews.comment: I just had jaw surgery, this is excellent for getting help with the repetitive things so I don\'t have to talk to much

reviews.comment: Funny and not racist like some retards have suggested. Would be nice if it would read incoming text messages.
